articles.title: FTC upholds ban on stalkerware founder Scott Zuckerman
articles.description: Zuckerman, who used to run the stalkerware apps SpyFone and SpyTrac, claimed the ban is hurting his unrelated business.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: SoftBank and Nvidia reportedly in talks to fund Skild AI at $14B, nearly tripling its value
articles.description: Skild AI is developing a hardware-agnostic foundation model for robots that can be customized for various uses.
articles.author: Marina Temkin

articles.title: Investor letter reveals skyrocketing growth of Waymo’s robotaxi rides
articles.description: Six months ago, Waymo disclosed it was providing 250,000 robotaxi rides. But it's grown significantly since, a leaked letter says.
articles.author: Kirsten Korosec

articles.title: Department of Commerce approves Nvidia H200 chip exports to China
articles.description: This news comes as a bill was introduced in Congress last week to prevent these exact kinds of chip exports.
articles.author: Rebecca Szkutak

articles.title: Google’s AI try-on app Doppl adds a shoppable discovery feed
articles.description: The tech giant says the idea behind the new feed is to display recommendations so users can discover and virtually try on items. Nearly everything in
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Lucid Motors’ former chief engineer sues for wrongful termination and discrimination
articles.description: Eric Bach, who was fired in November, claims a top HR executive at the automaker called him a "German Nazi."
articles.author: Sean O'Kane

articles.title: Tiger Global plans cautious venture  future with a new $2.2B fund
articles.description: Tiger's last fund did well with investmetments in OpenAI, Waymo and Databricks. But it warns investors that AI valuations are already 'elevated.'
articles.author: Julie Bort

articles.title: Environmental groups call for halt to new data center construction
articles.description: More than 230 organizations signed a public letter urging members of Congress to take action.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: Claude Code is coming to Slack, and that’s a bigger deal than it sounds
articles.description: Anthropic launches Claude Code in Slack, letting developers delegate coding tasks from chat threads. It's part of a shift toward AI-embedded
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Google details security measures for Chrome’s agentic features
articles.description: Google details how it is enacting security guardrails before rolling out agentic capabilities on Chrome.
articles.author: Ivan Mehta

articles.title: You can buy your Instacart groceries without leaving ChatGPT
articles.description: Shoppers will be able to go from recipe planning to checkout within the ChatGPT window.
articles.author: Amanda Silberling

articles.title: TikTok adds a space for organizing content with others, teases ‘Shared Feeds’
articles.description: Shared Feeds will surface new content tailored to both users' tastes, such as sports or winter activities, and their favorite creators.
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Petco’s security lapse affected customers’ SSNs, driver’s licenses, and more
articles.description: Petco said the exposure was due to an error in an application and that it is notifying victims whose data was affected.
articles.author: Lorenzo Franceschi-Bicchierai

articles.title: Heat pump startup Quilt raises $20M Series B to expand sales
articles.description: Quilt has sold nearly 1,000 units in the U.S. and Canada, and the new funding should help expand sales operations to more states and provinces.
articles.author: Tim De Chant

articles.title: ‘ONE RULE’: Trump says he’ll sign an executive order blocking state AI laws despite bipartisan pushback
articles.description: “I will be doing a ONE RULE Executive Order this week,” Trump posted on social media. “You can’t expect a company to get 50 Approvals every time they
articles.author: Rebecca Bellan

articles.title: Paramount goes to war with Netflix for Warner Bros. Discovery with hostile $108.4B bid
articles.description: Paramount Skydance on Monday launched a hostile, $108.4 billion bid to buy Warner Bros. Discovery, days after Warner Bros. agreed to be acquired by
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: IBM to acquire Confluent for $11B as it seeks to bolster its data offerings
articles.description: IBM is buying data infrastructure company Confluent for $11 billion in cash in a bid to bolster its data and automation products as ever more
articles.author: Ram Iyer

articles.description: The company says the space is designed to give creators everything they need to produce viral videos, grow their audience, and tap into trends,
articles.author: Aisha Malik

articles.title: Hinge’s new AI feature helps daters move beyond boring small talk
articles.description: Hinge launched “Convo Starters,” a feature powered by AI that provides personalized tips for initiating meaningful conversations.
articles.author: Lauren Forristal

articles.author: Rebecca Bellan
